thread.title: BRIEF-NiSource Adopts Amendment Of Co's Bylaws To Add Position Of Vice Chairman Of Board

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-NiSource Adopts Amendment Of Co's Bylaws To Add Position Of Vice Chairman Of Board
text:
January 26, 2018 / 10:07 PM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-NiSource Adopts Amendment Of Co's Bylaws To Add Position Of Vice Chairman Of Board Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 26 (Reuters) - Nisource Inc: 
* NISOURCE INC SAYS BOARD OF CO ADOPTED AN AMENDMENT AND RESTATEMENT OF CO'S BYLAWS TO ADD POSITION OF VICE CHAIRMAN OF BOARD, EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY Source text: ( bit.ly/2DFzyIx ) Further company coverage:
